review: Didn't work on my primary 61" Samsung dlp. I realize its 8+ years old now, but it has HDMI, so it should just work. Works good on my 32" LCD, and I'm happy with its function there.

review: The directions for hook up were very easy. I am very pleased with my Fire stick. I would recommend it.
author: SHEILA R STAHL

review: I don't know if I got a defective model, but it is completely unable to stay connected to the Internet. I am on my computer as I type this, same room, same Internet. My computer has no problem connecting. The Fire TV stick-- nothing but problems. We previously had a Roku and did not experience the same issues, so it is pretty much down to the device. It is worthless, and I can never get more than 5-10 minutes into any given show. I did try the work around someone suggested of using the HDMI attachment, but that did nothing. So disappointed.
author: MamaBreak
